frontpagetext: The Norwegian Neonatal Medical Health Atlas covers all newborn children who have been admitted to wards for sick newborns in Norway in the period 2009 to 2014.
ingress: The fact sheets provide a brief description of the patient samples, as well as information about the population’s use of services in geographical areas (hospital referral areas). The use is measured as the number of contacts per 100.000 population. The factsheets also include brief comments on the variation in use between geographical areas.

innhold.tekst: More results and analyzes can be found in the [report](/helseatlas/files/norwegian-neonatal-healthcare.pdf).

- [Admissions](/helseatlas/files/fact-sheet-neonatal_admissions.pdf)
- [Infections and antibiotic treatment](/helseatlas/files/fact-sheet-neonatal_infections.pdf)
- [Ventilator treatment](/helseatlas/files/fact-sheet-neonatal_ventilator.pdf)
- [Hypoglycaemia and phototherapy](/helseatlas/files/fact-sheet-neonatal_hypophoto.pdf)
- [Intensive care](/helseatlas/files/fact-sheet-neonatal_intensivecare.pdf)

**Read more:** more results and analyzes can be found in the [report](/helseatlas/files/norwegian-neonatal-healthcare.pdf).
